'''Embēta''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A warrior of the Wahaki, Embeta leads the tribe in the defense of the ancient jungle of Motare o Kozi, where nature herself seems to have gone mad.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* When landing at the island, you need to go through Embeta to reach the inner parts of it. 
}}
